array.string: Check your goals regularly (e.g. once a fortnight) and adjust your tasks.
The key is to design habits that will help you achieve your goals.
Habits take 30+ days to establish. Try to keep your hit rate above 50% and steadily increasing.
If your hit rate is consistently above 80% then perhaps adjust the task up a notch in difficulty to keep pushing yourself.
Get motivation and help from your friends by posting to social networks.
Sick of the ads or want to buy us a coffee? For a few dollars you can do both :)
Have a suggested feature or improvement? Let us know and we'll add it to our to do list
Please take a moment to rate our app or better still tell your friends about it
